<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Half-Truths](/Feats.aspx?ID=4123) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 76</row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5); Expert in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

You are able to weave your words in such a way that you never use actual lies, but still mislead people to certain conclusions. You can attempt to make a [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of a creature using Deception instead of Diplomacy. You can attempt to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) to a creature using [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) instead of Deception. If you fail your check to Lie, the creature realizes that you were twisting words to fool them without outright lying.
name: Half-Truths
prerequisite: Expert in Deception; Expert in Diplomacy
